message: Let's split fairly, I get a bit more
My turn. How about this slightly more in my favor split?  The value decreases each round, so let's settle this quickly.
Come on, let's meet in the middle, slightly in my favor
This is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a 50/50 split.  Let's be fair and end this before inflation eats away at the value.
You're getting closer, but I still want a bit more. Inflation isn't affecting me, so I can wait
Okay, a more serious offer. This is a small win for you, but it's getting late, and I want to settle this before inflation hurts me more.
You're going in the wrong direction. Inflation is on my side, and I'm not budging much
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm offering a slight advantage for you, but this needs to end now. Every round costs me significantly. Don't let's both lose out.
I'm not feeling generous. You're running out of time, and inflation is killing your share. Take this or risk getting less
Alice, this is it. My final offer - a fair 50/50 split. If you refuse, I'll accept your 45/55 in the next round.  Don't let greed make us both losers.
You said you'd accept this, so here it is. Last chance before we both lose
